name: Ancestral Enmity
text: You can counter the special defensive training the stouter races have against your kind.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls against dwarves and gnomes.
special: You may select this feat twice. Its effects stack.
text_zh: 你熟知那些矬子对巨人的憎恨，并研究了针对这些家伙的战术。
benefit_zh: 你在对矮人或侏儒发动的近战攻击检定上获得+2加值。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择本专长，它们的效果叠加。
